producttransfer.name: producttransfer
producttransfer.description: Represents the transfer of inventory between locations in field service.

Description.description: Details not recorded in the provided fields.

DestinationLocationId.description: The place the product is to be delivered.

ExpectedPickupDate.description: The date that the transfer is being requested for.

IsReceived.description: Checkbox identifying that the product was received.

LastReferencedDate.description: The date when the product request was last modified. Its label in the user interface is Last Modified Date.

LastViewedDate.description: The date when the product request was last viewed.

Product2Id.description: Lookup field for the product associated with the product transfer.

ProductTransferNumber.description: An auto-assigned number that identifies the product transfer.

QuantityReceived.description: Amount of product received at the destination location.

QuantitySent.description: Amount of product thatâ€™s being requested.

QuantityUnitOfMeasure.description: The units of the product, for example grams, liters, or units.

ReceivedById.description: Lookup field for the person who received the product at the destination location.

ShipmentExpectedDeliveryDate.description: The date for which the transfer is being accepted..

SourceLocationId.description: Reference to the location of the inventory making the transfer.

SourceProductItemId.description: Reference to the inventory making the transfer.

Status.description: The status of the transfer request.
